Title: #80 5 Ways to Adjust Teaching to How the Brain Learns
Description:
Ramona Persaud, director of the film, Grey Matters, talks about how we can teach kids the way the brain learns.

Read the show notes at www.coolcatteacher.com/e80 about 5 hours after this show goes live on iTunes. Listen to the rest of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast
